availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Benton, Kentucky, carpenter. Illinois native. Son of M. A. Howerton. Carpenter in Benton in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Benton, p. 3; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 5; Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates â€“ Microfilm (1911-1964), Lyon County, 1913, file no. 16518, Microfilm rolls #7016130-7041803, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky; KYR-0001-029-0529.
